top.title: 'Difficult' Russia-Ukraine peace talks end without breakthrough
top.summary: The second day of negotiations between Ukraine and Russia ended after just two hours.

top.title: Wave of arrests over killing of French nationalist piles pressure on far left
top.summary: Eleven people are in detention in connection with the killing of far-right student activist Quentin Deranque.

top.title: Iran security official appears to fire on crowd at cemetery
top.summary: It happened as people gathered to commemorate those killed during the government’s brutal crackdown on protesters

top.title: Zuckerberg arrives to testify in social media addiction trial
top.summary: The billionaire Meta chief executive faces questioning over whether use of Instagram harms children.

top.title: Call of Duty advert banned for trivialising sexual violence
top.summary: Activision Blizzard UK Ltd said the ad for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 was targeted at adults.

top.title: 'I do not trust them' - top streamers left concerned by Discord age checks
top.summary: The platform's plan to roll out global age checks has caused concern in streaming communities.
